channel.title: 718 Adding color to Options dialogue
channel.description:
[code]case OPTION_5: sendOptionsDialogue(SEND_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_TITLE, "Dagannoth Kings", "Sunfreet", "Hati", "Wildy Wyrms", "Chaos Elemental"); stage = 13; break;[/code]
I want Chaos Elemental to have a text color of red. However the other one's i want to remain the same color. Anyone know?

item.title: 718 Adding color to Options dialogue
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

case OPTION_5: sendOptionsDialogue(SEND_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_TITLE, "Dagannoth Kings", "Sunfreet", "Hati", "Wildy Wyrms", "<col=ff0000>Chaos Elemental</col>"); stage = 13; break;

^^ That would do.

Read full topic
